name: Make Pandemics Great Again
description:
Make Pandemics Great Again

A deadly pandemic has hit America! As president, it's up to you to lead the country to a vaccine, but one wrong move could spell disaster for your presidency! Your decisions affect everything, from the stock market to your base approval rating. Keep everything from crashing until a vaccine is found and you win!

This game is based on real events, actions, and choices ripped straight from the headlines over the past couple of weeks. So, what may feel like parody or propaganda is actually just reality.

Gameplay FAQ
  • Is it even possible to win?
    • Yes! But like the real pandemic, it's not easy.
  • What do the Emergency Only! buttons do?
    • These will help bail you out of certain situations, but they also come with downsides.
  • Where is the music from?
    • I used music from https://yaru.itch.io

(NOTE: In case it wasn't obvious, this game is a work of satire)
